accept_the_orders_to_start_preparing_the: Accept the orders to start preparing them.
menu_feedback_need_select_at_least_one_l: You need to select at least one language
card_print_tell_us_if_needed: Tell us if you need this!
menu_form_exact: Exact number of options to choose
menu_form_max: Maximum number of options to choose
has_to_be_a_positive_integer_number: Has to be a positive integer number
explication_components_in_create_menu_it: If you want to give options or make the customer to make a choice (eg. choose a size or add an ingredient) - you can do this by adding a 'Component' which has all these options. After you created a component, you can 'attach' it to each existent or new menu item
components_explanation: Components are a set of options you can attach to specific menu items. Your customers will be able to select different options like: size [small, medium, large...]

components.set_language: You have to set at least one language and the component explanation to the customer
components.set_option: You have to set at least one option

property_select.title: Location list
property_select.subtitle: Have multiple locations? You can manage all your locations in this page.
property_select.delete_location_contact_admin: Need to delete a location? Please contact admin@cibus.online for support.

errors.facebookUrl: Has to be a url (http included) and have no spaces

subtitles.register_image: Add a personalized image for your restaurant. This will be the welcome image for your menu. Choose a nice one! And make sure the image is compressed as much as possiblem since otherwise your customers will have to wait longtime!
subtitles.register_tables: Have multiple locations? You can create as many locations needed. Each location will have anindependent menu and admin control.
subtitles.create_new_property: Have multiple locations? You can create as many locations needed. Each location will have anindependent menu and admin control.

explanations.image_preview: Below is the preview of how your image would appear to customers
explanations.social_media: When your customers make an order, they would be invitd to follow you on the social media, if you input your contacts below
explanations.tables_convenience_numbered: You can change the name of the table for your convenience. By default, the table arenumbered.
